title: vEru tuNai enakku
sahitya:
vEru tuNai enakku yArum illaiyE Arumukha nAthanE unnai allAmal


anupallavi

  arupaDai vIDunadai sErum aDiyArkku vAri aruT-koDai vazhangiDum vaLLalE


caraNam    pArinil bhaktar palavAril vAzhkkaip-pOrinil Idu paTTup-pizhaikkap-pADupaTTu
sOrum pOdundan pEraruL peTruyya kOrum pOduru tuNai koDukkum udAraNE
